hypothesis_content.title: DeFi TVL Rotation from ETH to SOL During Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When the 7-day change in Solana Total Value Locked (TVL) exceeds the 7-day change in Ethereum TVL by more than 15 percentage points while BTC is in a NEUTRAL regime (price between Bollinger Band 40% and 60%), a long SOL/ETH pair position will generate positive alpha over the subsequent 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During neutral BTC regimes, capital rotates between major smart contract platforms based on relative ecosystem momentum. A significant TVL growth divergence suggests developer and user migration that often precedes price outperformance. The 5-day window captures the initial re-rating before mean reversion.
entry_conditions: BTC daily close between 40th and 60th percentile of 20-day Bollinger Bands (NEUTRAL regime)
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 5-day return of SOL/ETH pair after signal is ≤ 0% or Sharpe ratio < 0.5 in backtest across 2023-2024 data.
